name: CORSAIR - iCUE H100i ELITE CAPELLIX XT 120mm Fans + 240mm Radiator Liquid Cooling System with ultra-bright CAPELLIX RGB LEDs - Black
description: The CORSAIR iCUE H100i ELITE CAPELLIX XT Liquid CPU Cooler provides powerful, high-performance cooling for your Intel® or AMD® processor. With 2x CORSAIR AF RGB ELITE fans, a high-surface-area 240mm radiator, and a quiet, stylish pump head topped with 33 ultra-bright CAPELLIX LEDs, the H100i ELITE CAPELLIX XT is the all-in-one CPU cooler to keep your processor performing at its best. AF RGB ELITE fans produce incredible low-noise airflow with PWM-controlled speeds up to 2,100 RPM as quietly as 36 dBa, plus support for Zero RPM mode to eliminate fan noise entirely at low loads. CORSAIR AirGuide technology utilizes anti-vortex vanes to direct airflow for concentrated cooling, while eight RGB LEDs per fan illuminate your system in brilliant lighting effects. Orchestrate the light show and adjust speeds on up to six fans with the included CORSAIR iCUE COMMANDER CORE fan and lighting controller. Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software unites your setup, unlocking RGB lighting control and synchronization with all iCUE-compatible devices, and enables you to monitor system temps from a single intuitive interface. The H100i ELITE CAPELLIX XT is easy to install thanks to the extended 400mm tubing length, premium pre-applied CORSAIR XTM70 thermal paste, and modular tool-free bracket mounts. Install the cooler onto compatible Intel® and AMD® motherboard sockets including LGA 1700, 1200, 115X, and 2066, plus AMD Socket AM5 and AM4. With superb, quiet performance backed by a five-year warranty, the H100i ELITE CAPELLIX XT puts CPU cooling in a whole new light.
